name: Erin's Birthday Quest
description:
Suggested soundtrack (composed for this game):

This was made as a birthday present to my partner, Erin. She's a fan of trading quests in games, so I made a short one which references our lives. If you want to try this out, there's not too much inside knowledge you need to catch up on:

1) We have a dog called Jess!
2) I play a musical instrument called an EWI, and I love coffee!
3) Erin works at a library, and it's not always a great job!
4) Erin likes owls!

You're all caught up. Arrow keys to navigate and advance text. If you're checking this out, thanks for taking a little journey into our relationship and personal lives :)
